text: ONNO bamboo t-shirt Couldn't load pickup availability ONNO’s bamboo t-shirt is silky, lightweight and Made to Move®. In other words, it’s super comfortable. If you’re new to ONNO, you should start with bamboo and beechwood (yes, both). DETAILS - Bamboo is one of ONNO's lightweight t-shirts along with beechwood and organic cotton. If you want a midweight fabric, try hemp or pima cotton. - <model-info-details> - Fit: tailored, flattering but not too tight. Based on reviews, these shirts run a dash small. If you’re between sizes, or like a looser fit, we recommend sizing up. - 70% viscose from organic bamboo, 30% organic cotton. - To prevent shrinkage, wash cold and tumble dry low. Washing hot and drying hot can cause your shirt to shrink up to half a size. - See our factory - Questions about fit, or anything else? E-mail – hello@onno.com MORE Bamboo is grass, and one of the fastest growing plants on earth. It thrives without the use of pesticides, produces 35% more oxygen than trees, is beneficial for the soil, and is highly renewable. It’s a great plant. Size Chart For chest and bust measurement, measure under your arms around the fullest part of your chest. If you are between sizes or prefer a looser fit, we recommend sizing up.
